context_of_use: The customer wants to track their orders to know the delivery status.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: to know the delivery status of their orders.
description: Enables customers to view the status and tracking information for their orders.
triggering_event: Customer requests to track an order.
preconditions: The customer has placed an order.
The customer is logged into their account.
postconditions: The customer can view the current status of their order.
The customer can see tracking information.
assumptions: The system has access to the order tracking information.
The customer has a valid account.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to track their orders.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of tracking information provided.
main_flow: 1. Customer requests to track an order → System retrieves order tracking information.
2. System displays the current status of the order → Customer views the order status.
3. System provides tracking information → Customer reviews tracking details.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the order tracking information is unavailable, then the system displays an error message.
